messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] PICKLE JUICE
messages.msgSnippet: ... I find it useful.  I m on a lot of lists (not as many as Helen but I m working on it!) so if someone says something with my name in the post I read it
messages.messageBody:
Kolleen wrote:
>
> >Yikes! I *so* dislike posts that call a poster out by name. And in the
> >subject line, no less!
> >~Mary
>
> Its posting styles. This has been bantered about many times here.
> Basically the concensus was, if you don't like that person's posting
> style, then delete their messages.
>

I find it useful. I'm on a lot of lists (not as many as Helen but I'm
working on it!) so if someone says something with my name in the post
I read it first. Of course if there's more than one Cindy, it doesn't
help as much!<g>

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] PICKLE JUICE
messages.msgSnippet: ... Its posting styles. This has been bantered about many times here. Basically the concensus was, if you don t like that person s posting style, then delete
messages.messageBody:
>Yikes! I *so* dislike posts that call a poster out by name. And in the
>subject line, no less!
>~Mary


Its posting styles. This has been bantered about many times here.
Basically the concensus was, if you don't like that person's posting
style, then delete their messages.

If that person is calling you names or being prejudicial or derogatory..
thats another story.

kolleen


"People take different roads seeking
fulfillment and happiness. Just
because they're not on your road
doesn't mean they've gotten lost."
-H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
